name: Long term monitoring of crop yield in young arable alley cropping systems in Belgium
description: Dataset including results from crop yield and crop quality measurements obtained on a set of six alley cropping fields in Belgium during the first decade after their establishment. Sampled crops include maize, wheat, barley and potato.
data_project_name: VLAIO Porject 'Agroforestry in Vlaanderen', & VLAIO project 'Agroforestry2025'
spatial_details: crop dependent but between 7.5 m² and 15 m² ( 1.5 x 5 m & 1.5 x 10 m)
data_confidentiality: Data embargo, i.e there are rules or limits on using, sharing, or spreading it
access_barrier: Access to the data is evaluated before being granted, due to ethical, legal or contractual constrains (e.g. privacy, highly sensitive data)
data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
digitaf_data_wp: WP2 - Tools for practitioners and farm advisors
